Description: Wheelmade eramic goblet with a rolled rim, two handles, and a ring base, formed from Nile silt. Pot is covered with a red-brown slip that has darkened in places, and is embellished with a faint linear rocker impression. Likely an Egyptian import.
Bibliographic references: Adams 1986 / Ceramic Industries of Medieval Nubia, Part I, Part II (Figure 22) (Type B10)
